#Title: Quasars Probing Quasars VII. The Pinnacle of the Cool Circumgalactic 
#       Medium Surrounds Massive z ~ 2 Galaxies
#Authors: Prochaska J.X., Lau M.W., Hennawi J.F. 
#Table: QPQ7 EW Measurements
#================================================================================
#Byte-by-byte Description of file: apj503418t2_mrt.txt
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#   Bytes Format Units   Label  Explanations
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#   1- 19 A19    ---     f/gQ   Foreground quasar identifier (deleted)
#  21- 39 A19    ---     b/gQ   Background quasar identifier (deleted)
#  41- 43 I3     kpc     Rphys  Impact parameter 
#  45- 49 F5.3   kpc     zfg    Foreground quasar redshift
#  51- 55 I5     km/s    delv   Velocity offset (1)
#  57- 62 F6.3   0.1nm   W1334  ? Equivalent width of C II 1334 line (2)
#  64- 68 F5.3   0.1nm e_W1334  ? Uncertainty in W1334 (2)
#  70- 75 F6.3   0.1nm   W1548  ? Equivalent width of C IV 1548 line (2)
#  77- 81 F5.3   0.1nm e_W1548  ? Uncertainty in W1548 (2)
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#Note (1): From z_Ly{alpha}_ to zfg.  Note that absorption lines were assessed 
#          only for data with S/N_Ly{alpha}_ >9.5.
#Note (2): In units of Angstroms.
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
